message: Hi there! 👋 I'm Histronaut, your AI history tutor. Ask me anything about history or click one of the suggestions above to get started!

The provided text focuses on the consequences of the atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki, but it doesn't name the director of the Manhattan Project.  Based on my general knowledge, however, the director of the Manhattan Project, the top-secret US government program that developed the atomic bomb during World War II, was **Leslie Groves**.
